name: Air Canada E-190 takeoff from LAX
description:
Hey everyone, this is my departure from Los Angeles International Airport, onboard an Embraer E-190. Just as I got into my seat, I saw that KLM 747 taxiing, so I immediately got out my camera and started filming. Sorry about the break in the video right after I zoom in on the "Hobbit Jet" parked at a remote stand. I hope you enjoy the video!

Thanks for watching, please comment, rate, and subscribe! More videos are coming soon.
_____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/CFLWE
Aircraft registration: C-FLWE
Callsign: Air Canada ????
Runway used: 24L
